QuestData.Title: Infusing the Wildseed
QuestData.Description:
Dreamweaver tells me of a ritual to quell the wildseed's nightmares... but it will require anima.
A soul named Proglo lives beneath this tree, gathering anima for the grove's caretakers to use.
His mortal life came to a violent end, and his soul has been skittish ever since. He will not respond well to your current form.
I will grant you the ability to assume the soulshape of a fox. Approach Proglo in your new form to gain his trust and ask for his anima.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Soulshape to collect anima from Proglo, then infuse the wildseed with the collected anima.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ara'lon within Hibernal Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: It's going to be difficult, but I know of a place where there may be enough anima to help this wildseed.

Objectives.Objective: Anima recovered from Proglo while in soulshape
Speak with Dreamweaver to perform ritual
